# Project Memory

## Conventions

- Ruby 3.2+ required
- frozen_string_literal: true in all Ruby files

- Default task runs tests and linter
- RSpec uses documentation format

## Technical Constraints

- **Uses framework**: Sequel
- **Uses database**: SQLite3
